Summary: during a lightning storm we went outside to take a picture of the lightning and got these insted
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Kirkland
There were no other sightings in Kirkland on or around August 16th 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Detailsdiferent ufos i took pictures of during a lightning storm on augest 16 2008 In Kirkland Washington I live in ******* Washington and on Sunday August 16th we had a Lightning storm and I decided to go out and try to catch a picture of it ,,It was strange out because we normally don't get a lightning storm and there was no wind ,no rain and no sound,,just lightning my girl friend suggested we go out and try to take some pictures ,,and so I started to try to get some pictures of the lightning flashes I was to slow so I decided to do a little movie on my camera and I saw a white light flying around in the cameras view screen then I thought to take some more pictures facing the lightning and this is what I got ,,now I did some cut and paste to get a lot of the different shapes colors and sizes on one picture and the only other thing I did was to lighten the pictures and enhance the color that was already there ,,I have all the original pictures and these are all on one and enhanced for easer viewing,,I am long winded ,,sorry anyway I would love to know what you think these might be ,,I have seen the ghost busting shows and there 'orbs' are always white and small these are pretty big and I have never seen an orb other than white .Could these be ufos ,,if so I got a real show for my money I have always wanted to see something but never expected it to be in my back yard Anyway I would really appreciate your initial thoughts on this collogue,,Thanks so much PJD
